author: sonukapoor
message:
build(docs-infra): upgrade lighthouse to 6.1.0 (#37899)

To take advantage of lazy loaded images `img[loading=lazy]`, this commit
upgrades lighthouse to version 6.1.0.

Closes #35965

PR Close #37899

files.patch:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ Most Angular code can be written with just the latest JavaScript, using [types]( ## Feedback -

You can sit with us!

+

You can sit with us!

We want to hear from you. [Report problems or submit suggestions for future docs.](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/new/choose "Angular GitHub repository new issue form")
